thread.section_title: BOSS LASER Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of BOSS LASER | bosslaser.com
thread.title: CHAD Grosklags
thread.title_full: BOSS LASER reviewed by CHAD Grosklags

author: CHAD Grosklags
title: CHAD Grosklags
text: There is a bit of a learning curve to the RD Works software but between the training offered, tech support, videos online and the Boss Laser group on Facebook I have worked my way through most issues. It's a big purchase and for a person that hasn't had a lot of CNC type experience it's good to know you have others out there to help. I went with Boss because they are based in the US and their prices are relatively affordable. As I learn and try new projects, I'll be posting videos on my youtube channel ManCrafting. Thanks for all the support.
